title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal
descriptions:
### Elevate Your Practice with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat

Step into your practice with the confidence and comfort that only the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat can provide. Designed for yogis, fitness enthusiasts, and anyone looking to enhance their floor exercises, this mat is a perfect blend of durability, support, and style.

**Key Features:**

- **Extra Thick Cushioning:** With a thickness of 2/5 inch, this mat offers superior cushioning to protect your joints during intense workouts, yoga sessions, and Pilates routines. Say goodbye to discomfort and hello to a more focused and enjoyable practice.

- **Soft and Supportive:** Made from high-quality NBR foam, the mat provides a soft, non-slip surface that keeps you steady and secure, even during the most challenging poses. The material is also resistant to wear and tear, ensuring your mat stays in top condition for longer.

- **Convenient Carrier Strap:** The included Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap makes it a breeze to carry your mat wherever you go. Whether you’re heading to the studio or practicing at home, this strap keeps your mat neatly rolled and easy to transport.

- **Versatile and Durable:** Suitable for yoga, Pilates, and a variety of floor exercises, this mat is the perfect companion for all your fitness needs. Weighing just 3.11 pounds, it’s lightweight enough to carry but sturdy enough to support your every move.

- **Stylish and Functional:** The vibrant teal color adds a pop of energy to your practice, making it not only a functional tool but also a stylish one. The mat’s dimensions of 72 inches in length and 24 inches in width provide ample space for any routine.

**Why Choose the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat?**

- **Enhanced Comfort:** The extra thickness and soft cushioning make this mat ideal for those who need a little extra support, whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned practitioner.
- **Non-Slip Surface:** The NBR foam material ensures a stable and secure grip, keeping you in control during your practice.
- **Durable Design:** Built to last, this mat is resistant to tears and wear, providing you with a reliable surface for all your fitness activities.
- **Convenience:** The Easy-Cinch Carrier Strap makes it easy to roll up and carry your mat, so you can take your practice on the go.

Transform your fitness routine with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat. Whether you’re a yoga enthusiast, a fitness lover, or just starting your wellness journey, this mat is the perfect addition to your toolkit. Order yours today and experience the difference a high-quality, supportive mat can make!
